trans-unit.source: Describes the possible values for the status of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation" />.
trans-unit.target: Descreve os possíveis valores para o status de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation" />.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> is returned after a call to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> será retornado após uma chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> can be used to interact with the delegate on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> queue, such as changing the priority of the operation or aborting the operation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> pode ser usado para interagir com o delegado no <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> fila, como alterar a prioridade da operação ou anular a operação.

trans-unit.source: The stages of a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> are Pending, Executing, and Completed.
trans-unit.target: Os estágios de um <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> estão aguardando, executando e concluído.

trans-unit.source: At any point before the operation completes, the status can be set to Aborted.
trans-unit.target: A qualquer momento antes da conclusão da operação, o status pode ser definido para Aborted.

trans-unit.source: The operation started executing, but has not completed.
trans-unit.target: A operação iniciou a execução, mas não foi concluída.

trans-unit.source: The operation is pending and is still in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> queue.
trans-unit.target: A operação está pendente e ainda está na fila <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" />.
